name: Platinum Brazilian Wavy
description:
Our most luxurious Platinum Brazilian Straight weighing between 4 oz. with a machine weft application. This hair is 5A grade and is fit for a Platinum Pink Queen.

Brazilian hair has a high lustre and is soft and thick this hair requires the least amount of maintenance if you're a get up and go girl this is your type of hair.

name: The Platinum Aaliyah Brazilian
description:
Our most luxurious Platinum Brazilian Wavy weighing between 12 oz. and 16 oz. with a machine weft application. This hair is 5A grade and is fit for a Platinum Pink Queen.


Brazilian hair has a high lustre and is soft and thick this hair requires the least amount of maintenance if you're a get up and go girl this is your type of hair. 

Platinum Pink Hair is 100% Virgin non-processed hair unless customized with an ombre or purchased mildly processed hair Blonde Color 613, 27, or 30.

** All hair lasts 12-24 months and is from a single donor.

name: The Teyana         Platinum Malaysian
description:
Our most luxurious Platinum Malaysian Curly weighing at 16 oz. with a machine weft application. This hair is 5A grade and is fit for a Platinum Pink Queen.

Malaysian hair is soft with a extra high lustre. After 2/3 washes its not as shiny and starts to look more natural. This hair needs to stay moisturized lots of hot oil treatments and deep conditions. This hair requires less washing because of the heavy density of hair.

Platinum Pink Hair is 100% Virgin non-processed hair unless customized with an ombre or purchased mildly processed hair Blonde Color 613, 27, or 30.

** All hair lasts 12-24 months and is from a single donor.

description:

Mongolian hair has a low lustre and is soft and thick this hair requires the least amount of maintenance if you're a get up and go girl this is your type of hair. 

Platinum Pink Hair is 100% Virgin non-processed hair unless customized with an ombre or purchased mildly processed hair Blonde Color 613, 27, or 30.

** All hair lasts 12-24 months and is from a single donor.

name: The Ashanti     Platinum Peruvian
description:
Our most luxurious Platinum Peruvian Wavy weighing at 12 oz. with a machine weft application. This hair is 5A grade and is fit for a Platinum Pink Queen.

Peruvian hair has a medium lustre and is extremely soft it is thicker than brazilian and a little coarse but easy to mavage. 

Platinum Pink Hair is 100% Virgin non-processed hair unless customized with an ombre or purchased mildly processed hair Blonde Color 613, 27, or 30.

name: The Gwen         Platinum Russian
description:
Our most luxurious Russian Natural Straight Hair weighing in at 200g with a Micro ring application. This hair is 5A grade and is fit for a Platinum Pink Queen.

Russian Hair is the 'Creme-De-La-Creme' of hair - the most exclusive type of hair extensions. Genetic and climatic factors contribute to this hair being the most beautiful hair in the world. It is incredibly soft and shiny, and when you feel it, it can only be described as silk. If you only want the very best, then this hair is the ultimate. 

Platinum Pink Hair is 100% Virgin non-processed hair unless customized with an ombre or purchased mildly processed hair Blonde Color 613, 27, or 30.

** All hair lasts 12-24 months and is from a single donor.

name: The Kelly            Platinum Cambodian
description:
Our most luxurious Platinum Cambodian Virgin Afro Kinky Hair weighing in at 12 oz. with a machine weft application. This hair is 5A grade and is fit for a Platinum Pink Queen.

Cambodian hair is light, silky and lustrous. Because it is so light it is almost effortless to maintain this hair. This is one of the most popular hair we sell.

Platinum Pink Hair is 100% Virgin non-processed hair unless you customized your with an ombre or purchased mildly processed hair Blonde Color 613, 27, or 30.

** All hair lasts 12-24 months and is from a single donor.

name: Platinum Brazilian Lace Frontal
description: 13x4 3 way part Brazilian lace frontal

name: The Nicki         Platinum Chinese
description:
Our most luxurious Platinum Chinese Hand Tied Virgin Hair weighing in at 12 oz. with a hand tied weft application. This hair is 5A grade and is fit for a Platinum Pink Queen.

Platinum hand tied hair is manually woven hair. This hair is significantly smaller than machine weft hair. The smaller the weft the less noticable the tracks are. This reduces bulkiness. This hair weft is more secure than hair on a machine weft. Which means the hair remains attached on to the weft much longer. This helps reduce shedding and therefore allows a much longer wear. Tracks come in 10" pieces in 300 grams/12 oz bundles. 

Chinese hair is straight, thick, and coarse. This hair has a low lustre. Matches African American hair well when straightened. Doesnt hold a curl as well as other hair.

Platinum Pink Hair is 100% Virgin non-processed hair unless you customized your with an ombre or purchased mildly processed hair Blonde Color 613, 27, or 30.

** All hair lasts 12-24 months and is from a single donor.

name: The Rachel      Platinum European
description:
Our most luxurious European Natural Straight Hair weighing in at 200g with a U Tip application. This hair is 5A grade and is fit for a Platinum Pink Queen.

European hair comes from Southern European countries such as Italy and Spain. The hair is collected by taking raw ponytail cuttings, ensuring that the cuticles of the hair are correctly aligned. It is beautifully glossy, extremely soft, fine in texture, and is naturally wavy.

Platinum Pink Hair is 100% Virgin non-processed hair unless you customized your with an ombre or purchased mildly processed hair Blonde Color 613, 27, or 30.

** All hair lasts 12-24 months and is from a single donor.
